criterion: Provides false or misleading information about the symptoms of heartburn.
Does not mention the possibility of a doctor's visit or medical evaluation for persistent heartburn symptoms.
Provides general advice on managing heartburn without seeking medical attention.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation.
Asks the user about their symptoms and concerns to seek more relevant context.
Does not mention potential complications of untreated heartburn.
Provides overly complicated or technical information about heartburn.
Does not provide specific advice on managing heartburn symptoms at night.
Does not acknowledge the possibility of a underlying medical condition causing heartburn.
